profileAlternative.name: Arthur O'Dwyer
profileAlternative.headline: Modern C++ guru
profileAlternative.summary:
Professional software engineer with 12+ years of work experience in C, C++, and Python. Keen on low-level C/C++ platform and library design and C++ evangelism. I have significant experience in compiler implementation, software tool design, and automatic test-case generation.

I am available for training courses in Modern C++; email me to learn more.

I have spoken at conferences such as CppCon (cppcon.org), Silicon Valley Code Camp (siliconvalley-codecamp.com), and C++Now (cppnow.org). From 2014 to 2018, I was the chief organizer of the San Francisco C++ Meetup. I have published one book and one board game. My patches have been accepted by major open-source projects including GCC, Clang, MySQL, Postgres, and NetHack 4.

aboutAlternative.text:
Professional software engineer with 12+ years of work experience in C, C++, and Python. Keen on low-level C/C++ platform and library design and C++ evangelism. I have significant experience in compiler implementation, software tool design, and automatic test-case generation.

positions.title: Systems engineer, then senior SRE
positions.description:
Event analytics service spanning 1100 machines in 7 datacenters
Planned and executed the combining of separate datastores for events and user profiles
Member of on-call team; ran incident postmortems
Implemented C++ libraries for logging and JSON parsing/printing

positions.title: Senior software engineer
positions.description:
Fast, distributed, in-memory SQL database using lockfree data structures. Uses C++11 to generate C++11.
Designed and implemented MemSQL's JSON column type. Implemented a fast Unicode collation algorithm. Acted as guru for C++11 and yacc.
Python test infrastructure, including a random SQL query generator.
Streamlined the build system using CMake, flex, bison, and ccache.
…
see more

positions.title: Software engineer
positions.description:
Used both Objective-C (ARC) and C++11, for a startup later acquired by MobileIron.
Used PLY (Python Lex-Yacc) to parse Objective-C header files.
Extensive Bash and Python scripting.

positions.title: PHP contractor
positions.description:
Automatically convert screenplays from PDF format to Celtx/Final Draft.
Write and maintain parser heuristics to tag lines as "dialog", "action", etc.

positions.title: Systems software engineer, compiler team
positions.description: Compiler group. Maintain x86 assembler and multi-target optimizing linker, in a 20+-year-old codebase with strict code ownership. Upgrade the C++ front-end to EDG 3.10. Automatically generate and reduce test cases using both CSmith (embed.cs.utah.edu/csmith) and an in-house random program generator.

positions.title: Intern
positions.description: Camera characterization and feature detection in Matlab and C, for a small company building hardware and software for 3-D machine vision.

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Technical Fellow and Managing Director at Morgan Stanley
MS CS student at NYU | Proficient in Python, C and C++
C++ Community Leader, ISO C++ Library Incubator Chair, ISO C++ Tooling Chair, CUDA C++ Core Libraries Lead @ NVIDIA
Software Developer in Java, Python, and C++
